name: Coconut Almond Rum Balls. Glutenfree. Vegan
description: Coconut Almond Rum Balls. Easy Festive Coconut rum balls. Make these into Indian sweet Ladoo with cardamom instead of rum.
recipeIngredient: 3 Tablespoons raw sugar (ground to a fine powder)
1-2 Tablespoons Agave or maple syrup (or any thick sugar/sweet syrup)
2 -3 Tablespoons Rum or fruit juice of choice
cocoa powder (coconut flakes or melted vegan chocolate for rolling)

recipeInstructions.text: Grind the almonds and oats to a coarse powder.
recipeInstructions.name: Grind the almonds and oats to a coarse powder.

recipeInstructions.text: Add 1/2 cup coconut flakes and grind all together again until most coconut flakes break into smaller flakes/coarse powder.
recipeInstructions.name: Add 1/2 cup coconut flakes and grind all together again until most coconut flakes break into smaller flakes/coarse powder.

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, add this clumpy mixture, rum, oil, salt and agave and mix. Add sugar and mix in.
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl, add this clumpy mixture, rum, oil, salt and agave and mix. Add sugar and mix in.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix and keep adding coconut flakes if needed till you get a soft dough. Adjust sweetness by adding more powdered sugar or agave.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix and keep adding coconut flakes if needed till you get a soft dough. Adjust sweetness by adding more powdered sugar or agave.

recipeInstructions.text: Make balls and roll in coconut flakes, or cocoa powder or dip in melted chocolate.
recipeInstructions.name: Make balls and roll in coconut flakes, or cocoa powder or dip in melted chocolate.
